titles.title: Lord Thou Hast Won (difficult to fit words wit

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord Thou hast won at length I yield My heart by mighty grace compelled Surrenders all to Thee Against Thy terrors long I strove But who can stand against Thy love Love conquers even me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If Thou hadst bid Thy thunders roll And light'nings flash to blast my soul I still had stubborn been But mercy has my heart subdued A bleeding Savior I have viewed And now I hate my sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now Lord I would be Thine alone Come take possesion of Thine own For Thou hast set me free Released from Satan's hard command See all my powers waiting stand To be employed by Thee{/lang-eng}
